plugins.name: forge-plugin
plugins.description: Sing, clear-voiced Muses, of Hephaestus famed for inventions.  With bright-eyed Athene he taught men glorious gifts throughout the world, -- men who before used to dwell in caves in the mountains like wild beasts.  But now that they have learned craft through Hephaestus the famed worker, easily they live a peaceful life in their own houses the whole year round.
